00023    /* 
00024    * Default constructor.
00025    */
00026    OrthorhombicBoundary::OrthorhombicBoundary() 
00027     : OrthoRegion(),
00028       lattice_(Orthorhombic)
00029    {
00030       for (int i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00031          invLengths_[i] = 1.0/lengths_[i];
00032          bravaisBasisVectors_.append(Vector::Zero);
00033          bravaisBasisVectors_[i][i] = lengths_[i];
00034          reciprocalBasisVectors_.append(Vector::Zero);
00035          reciprocalBasisVectors_[i][i] = 2.0*Constants::Pi/lengths_[i];
00036       }
00037       minLength_ = lengths_[0];
00038       for (int i = 1; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00039          if (lengths_[i] < minLength_) {
00040             minLength_ = lengths_[i];
00041          }
00042       }
00043    }
00044 
00045    /* 
00046    * Set box lengths and then call reset.
00047    */
00048    void OrthorhombicBoundary::setOrthorhombic(const Vector &lengths) 
00049    {  
00050       maxima_  = lengths; 
00051       lattice_ = Orthorhombic;
00052       reset(); 
00053    }
00054 
00055    /* 
00056    * Set box lengths and then call reset.
00057    */
00058    void OrthorhombicBoundary::setTetragonal(double ab, double c) 
00059    {  
00060       maxima_[0] = ab;
00061       maxima_[1] = ab;
00062       maxima_[2] = c;
00063       lattice_ = Tetragonal;
00064       reset(); 
00065    }
00066 
00067    /* 
00068    * Set box lengths and call reset.
00069    */
00070    void OrthorhombicBoundary::setCubic(double a) 
00071    {  
00072       maxima_[0] = a;
00073       maxima_[1] = a;
00074       maxima_[2] = a;
00075       lattice_ = Cubic;
00076       reset(); 
00077    }
00078 
00079    /* 
00080    * Reset all quantities that depend on unit cell lengths.
00081    */
00082    void OrthorhombicBoundary::reset()
00083    {
00084       resetRegion();
00085       for (int i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00086          invLengths_[i] = 1.0/lengths_[i];
00087          bravaisBasisVectors_[i][i] = lengths_[i];
00088          reciprocalBasisVectors_[i][i] = 2.0*Constants::Pi/lengths_[i];
00089       }
00090 
00091       minLength_ = lengths_[0];
00092       for (int i = 1; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00093          if (lengths_[i] < minLength_) {
00094             minLength_ = lengths_[i];
00095          }
00096       }
00097 
00098    }
00099 
00100    /* 
00101    * Generate a random position within the box
00102    *
00103    * \param random random number generator object
00104    * \param r      Vector of random coordinates
00105    */
00106    void OrthorhombicBoundary::randomPosition(Random &random, Vector &r) const 
00107    {
00108      for (int i=0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00109         r[i] = random.uniform(minima_[i], maxima_[i]);
00110      }
00111    }
00112 
00113    /* 
00114    * Check consistency of data.
00115    */
00116    bool OrthorhombicBoundary::isValid() 
00117    {  
00118       double dot;
00119       double twoPi = 2.0*Constants::Pi;
00120       int i, j;
00121 
00122       OrthoRegion::isValid(); 
00123       for (i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00124          if (!feq(minima_[i], 0.0)) {
00125             UTIL_THROW("minima_[i] != 0");
00126          }
00127          if (!feq(lengths_[i]*invLengths_[i], 1.0)) {
00128             UTIL_THROW("invLengths_[i]*lengths_[i] != 1.0");
00129          }
00130          for (j = 0; j < Dimension; ++j) {
00131             dot = bravaisBasisVectors_[i].dot(reciprocalBasisVectors_[j]);
00132             if (i == j) {
00133                if (!feq(dot, twoPi)) {
00134                   UTIL_THROW("a[i].b[i] != twoPi");
00135                } 
00136             } else {
00137                if (!feq(dot, 0.0)) {
00138                   UTIL_THROW("a[i].b[j] != 0 for i != j");
00139                }
00140             }
00141          }
00142       }
00143       return true;
00144    }
00145 
00146    /* 
00147    * Input a OrthorhombicBoundary from an istream, without line breaks.
00148    */
00149    std::istream& operator>>(std::istream& in, OrthorhombicBoundary &boundary)
00150    {
00151       LatticeSystem lattice;
00152       in >> lattice;
00153       if (lattice == Orthorhombic) {
00154          in >> boundary.maxima_;
00155       } else
00156       if (lattice == Tetragonal) {
00157          double ab, c;
00158          in >> ab >> c;
00159          boundary.maxima_[0] = ab;
00160          boundary.maxima_[1] = ab;
00161          boundary.maxima_[2] = c;
00162       } else 
00163       if (lattice == Cubic) {
00164          double a; 
00165          in >> a; 
00166          boundary.maxima_[0] = a;
00167          boundary.maxima_[1] = a;
00168          boundary.maxima_[2] = a;
00169       } else {
00170          UTIL_THROW("Lattice must be orthorhombic, tetragonal or cubic");
00171       }
00172       boundary.lattice_ = lattice;
00173       boundary.reset();
00174       return in;
00175    }
00176 
00177    /* 
00178    * Output an OrthorhombicBoundary to an ostream, without line breaks.
00179    */
00180    std::ostream& 
00181    operator<<(std::ostream& out, const OrthorhombicBoundary &boundary) 
00182    {
00183       out << boundary.lattice_ << "   ";
00184       if (boundary.lattice_ == Orthorhombic) {
00185          out << boundary.lengths_;
00186       } else
00187       if (boundary.lattice_ == Tetragonal) {
00188          out << Dbl(boundary.lengths_[0]);
00189          out << Dbl(boundary.lengths_[2]);
00190       } else 
00191       if (boundary.lattice_ == Cubic) {
00192          out << Dbl(boundary.lengths_[0]);
00193       }
00194       return out;
00195    }

00197    #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00198    template <>
00199    void send<Util::OrthorhombicBoundary>(MPI::Comm& comm, 
00200              Util::OrthorhombicBoundary& data, int dest, int tag)
00201    {
00202       Vector lengths = data.lengths();
00203       send<Vector>(comm, lengths, dest, tag);
00204    }
00205 
00206    template <>
00207    void recv<Util::OrthorhombicBoundary>(MPI::Comm& comm, 
00208              Util::OrthorhombicBoundary& data, int source, int tag)
00209    {
00210       Vector lengths;
00211       recv<Vector>(comm, lengths, source, tag);
00212       data.setOrthorhombic(lengths);
00213    }
00214 
00215    template <>
00216    void bcast<Util::OrthorhombicBoundary>(MPI::Intracomm& comm, 
00217               Util::OrthorhombicBoundary& data, int root)
00218    {
00219       Vector lengths; 
00220       int    rank = comm.Get_rank();
00221       if (rank == root) 
00222          lengths = data.lengths();
00223       bcast<Vector>(comm, lengths, root);
00224       if (rank != root) 
00225          data.setOrthorhombic(lengths);
00226    }
